item.description:
This month we meet Black-Eyed Susan, a native plant that showers us with her cheerful yellow and gold every summer.
We meet a different plant each month, using journeying and guided meditation to connect with the spirit of the plant. We also see the plant, taste tinctures, teas, flower essences or other medicines made from the plant, and discuss our experiences with the plant.Â 
There is a $25.00 fee for the class, payable when you arrive. To register and for more information, e-mail info@irisweaver.com or call 617-773-5809.
Meeting the plants, one at a time, and getting to know them on a deeper level.
item.name: DeepRoots Shamanic Plant Group-Black-Eyed Susan
